mapper.select: SELECT academy_id, academy_name, academy_loc, academy_url, academy_details, academy_logo_url, (SELECT count(*) FROM academy acdm INNER JOIN lecture lec ON acdm.academy_id = lec.academy_id WHERE acdm.academy_id = academy.academy_id) FROM academy WHERE academy.academy_id = #{0}
mapper.update: UPDATE academy SET academy_name = #{academyName}, academy_loc = #{academyLoc}, academy_url = #{academyUrl}, academy_details = #{academyDetails}, academy_logo_url = #{academyLogoUrl} WHERE academy_id = #{academyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO academy (academy_id, academy_name, academy_loc, academy_url, academy_details, academy_logo_url) VALUES (#{academyId}, #{academyName}, #{academyLoc}, #{academyUrl}, #{academyDetails}, #{academyLogoUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT academy_id FROM academy ORDER BY academy_id DESC LIMIT 1;
